showPSTreplacements.description: this Hook shows temporarily all the hidden Replacements inside the Output-Stream

sync.description: synchronize (some of the Fields of) an Entry to other Projects if the valid Project-Name is -comma-separated- defined in a field

clearcache.description: Delete all Files from a Folder in Project-Path (so pay Attention!!)

mark2html.description: Converts markdown to XHTML and saves it to another Field

prefill.description: fills content from a given File into a Field and reset the Path. Optional fill the File-Name as Flag into another Field

loadGenericModel.description: fills content from a Generic Model into a Field as MODEL and reset the Path. Optional fill the File-Name as Flag into another Field
